Acceptance Criteria - All pre-fabricated materials to be as per spec:, approved drawings and details and free from damages and rust.

Acceptance Criteria - Galvanising complete as per required specification
Acceptance Criteria - Galvanising complete as per required specification
Acceptance Criteria - Permanant bench mark for reference to be available.
Acceptance Criteria - Foundations are to be cast as per approved drawings and in correct orientations
4c - Check on levels and distances of foundations
Acceptance Criteria - Top level of the foundation wrt bench marks and centre to centre distance and diagonal distance are as per approved details.
Acceptance Criteria - Interchanging and turning of columns by 180 degrees to be avoided.
Acceptance Criteria - Columns are to be properly oriented and centre line of base plate to be coincide with foundation pedestal axis.
○ Foundation bolts to be properly tightened with lock nut
5c - Check for erection of horizontal beams, girders and vertical bracings
Acceptance Criteria - First piece of all columns are to be erected and aligned first. Pieces which affects the movement of crane or other equipment to be erected only at appropriate time.
Acceptance Criteria - Bolts to be of proper size and to be tightened properly as per bolt tightening procedure.
5e - Check on erection of interconnecting members
Acceptance Criteria - All remaining members to be erected as per the drawing and details providing facility to movement of crane and other equipment.
Acceptance Criteria - All welders to be have qualified welder Certificate or to be approved by performing test at site.
Acceptance Criteria - All welding consumables to be available as per the approved details
Acceptance Criteria - All joints to be pre heated by approved method by maintaining uniform temperature
5i - Check for fit up of joints
Acceptance Criteria - Minimum gap to be maintained for fillet welding.
5j - Check for assembly of welding parts
Acceptance Criteria - All parts to be welded shall be arranged so as to fit properly on assembly.
5k - Check for post weld heat treatment
Acceptance Criteria - To be done as applicable using appropriate heating method by maintaining uniform temperature.
6a - Check on columns and other members
Acceptance Criteria - Total erected columns to be vertical within the tolerance as per spec
○ All other members to be vertical or horizontal as the case may be within tolerance as per spec/standard
Acceptance Criteria - All welds to be cleaned, overlap / excess weld metal to be removed by grinding.
○ Weld size not to be less than specified.
Acceptance Criteria - All welding to be free from surface cracks, blow holes, infused welds, improper welding profile and misalignment of welded parts etc:
Acceptance Criteria - Tests to be done for required no.: of welds as per specification
6e - Check for repair of faulty welds
Acceptance Criteria - Defective weld to be removed up to the sound metal and parent metal is free from damage.
6f - Check for re weld and retest
Acceptance Criteria - To be done by using the same procedure and methods.
Acceptance Criteria - All tolerance to be within the limit specified
Acceptance Criteria - After all erections are approved.
○ Grouting to be done as per the approved method after cleaning and clearing of all dust, mud, water, oil and other unwanted material by using approved material.
Acceptance Criteria - Painting to be carried out as per specifications
